The Measures of Information Retrieval Effectiveness proposed by Swets .A Brookes, B. C. Objective comparisons of the effectiveness of IR techniques are needed for development of IR systems.. The measures proposed by Swets, which offer important advantages, are analyzed and critically discussed..
